text: 2|223|Tomalokara straisakala tomalokara babe sasyaksetra. Eteke tomaloke tomalokara sasyaksetrata yenekai iccha gamana karaiba paraa. Arau tomaloke nijara bharaisyatara babe kiba agalai praerana karaa arau allahaka bhaya karaa arau jani thoraa, niscaya tomaloka allahara sanmukhina haâ€™ba arau muminasakalaka susambada diya.
